name: Memorial Star Series: Sunsoft Vol. 3
overview: This Playstation game features 2 conversions of old NES games: In Madoola no Tsubasa the player takes the role of Lucia a armored female, Across 16 levels she finishing enemies with his sword, and destroy the final bosses to save his prince. In Toukaidou the player takes the role of a fireworks-maker named Kantaro, who has completed his training in the city of Kyoto and seeks to return to his fiancee, Momoko-chan), who lives in Edo. However, the evil merchant Gonzaemon, seeks to steal the secrets of fireworks manufacturing from Kantaro, and summons his cronies to harass him as he makes his way through the Tokaido route. Kantaro must defend himself by throwing firework grenades to fend off enemies. However, certain enemies are unaffected by grenades, and can only be killed off by explosions from grenades planted on the ground.
